bibl.title: A Mythological Ostrakon from Kellis.
assisted by Bruce E. PARR, The Oasis Papers 3. Proceedings of the Third International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project
bibl.author: WORP, Klaas A.

bibl.note: A version of the myth of Kyknos, son of Poseidon (a schoolboy's homework?). Kellis (Shrine II), later 3rd or first half of the 4th century).
bibl.seg: WORP Klaas A., A Mythological Ostrakon from Kellis.

Gillian E. BOWEN and Colin A. HOPE (Edd.), assisted by Bruce E. PARR, The Oasis Papers 3. Proceedings of the Third International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 14 (Oxford, 2003) pp. 379-382, 2 figg.
